about_the_game:
With this DLC an event will occur when you access Information at Planeptune to gain Fairy Fencer F related contents.

*The Coliseum must be available.
*If this DLC event was already seen, it will not occur again.
detailed_description:
With this DLC an event will occur when you access Information at Planeptune to gain Fairy Fencer F related contents.

*The Coliseum must be available.
*If this DLC event was already seen, it will not occur again.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version. On-board graphics card are not recommend. Highly recommend to have an independent graphics card.

short_description: This package includes Fairy Fencer F related contents.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
